title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 42-2.13 - Death proceeds not available in a lump sum
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 42-2.13 - Death proceeds not available in a lump sum

State Regulations

For determining the adjusted premiums in section
4221 (k)
of the Insurance Law, the present value of benefits payable only in installments shall be calculated using the applicable nonforfeiture interest rate and mortality table in section
4221 (k)
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
42-2.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
